
## 0.9.0 / 2012-07-20

  * New feature or Search as Pinyin first chars.

## before 0.8.0

  * Real-time search
  * High performance
  * Segment words search and prefix match search
  * Support match with alias
  * Support ActiveRecord and Mongoid
  * Sort results by one field
  * Homophone search, pinyin search
  * Conditions support
